title: When Day Breaks (Art)
content:
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

= [[image http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/art:when-day-breaks/daybroke.png]]

> Hi lovely-doves! I wanted to share a little sketch I did that I think came out pretty cool, of [*https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/shaggydredlocks-proposal one of the most iconic 001 proposals, When Day Breaks]. 
> 
> And of course, if you're a staunch enjoyer of the Horrors From Beyond Reason And Sense, [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/dr-vikki-lost my author page is here! Come along and be devoured by joy so unending it screams at your touch.] 
>  
> And as always - have a LOVELY day <333
author: Dr Vikki Lost
